data.name: X-Plane 11 - Add-on: Aerosoft - Airport Calvi
data.detailed_description:
The Airport Calvi - Sainte Catherine (CLY / LFKC) on the island of Corsica is beautifully embedded in a valley to the south-east of the town of Calvi. This is rendition of the airport Calvi - Sainte Catherine for X-Plane. The airport itself has been faithfully recreated with high resolution aerial images, numerous custom 3D objects and exact ground markings, including the old painted-over markings. It also includes reworked terrain and an impressive night lightning.

The developers have also paid great attention to the surrounding area of the airport, the nearby business park and the citadel of Calvi.
Landing approaches are particular fun in Calvi: While Sainte Catherine is usually approached from the seaside; pilots can fly past the airport to the west, then turn by 180 degrees and approach the runway from the south.


  • Realistic rendition of Calvi St. Catherine based on real life images
  • Photo real buildings
  • Large Aerial image with 50cm/pixel in the surroundings and 25cm/pixel on the airport, carefully fitted into the default X-Plane landscape and colour-adjusted
  • Customized terrain, runway follows terrain
  • Realistic reproduction of ground markings including old, painted-over markings
  • Animated marshaller (additional plugin ‘Autogate’ requested)
  • Customized night illumination
  • Custom made trees and forests
  • Very good performance and implementation
  • Animated bar on the entry of the parking lot
  • Numerous details
  • Changing static airplanes including wreckage to the south west
  • Animated road traffic
  • Recreation of the citadel of Calvi and vessel

data.short_description: The Airport Calvi - Sainte Catherine (CLY / LFKC) on the island of Corsica is beautifully embedded in a valley to the south-east of the town of Calvi. This is rendition of the airport Calvi - Sainte Catherine for X-Plane.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“As you will find, this really can be a challenging airport to fly in and out of if you come from the north side to runway 36, and for this reason it is also one of those gems that I believe goes largely unnoticed in the world of technically challenging airports, so thanks to Aerosoft for bringing it to life.”
http://www.flightsim.com/vbfs/content.php?16965-Review-Aerosoft-Airport-Calvi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Multi Core Processor 3.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D video card with 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Version 10.6.8 or older
  • Processor: Multi Core Processor 3.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D video card with 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Multi Core Processor 3.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D video card with 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
